Name: Banana Bliss
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
10 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of banana chip or slice.
Review: Banana liqueur and brandy go shockingly well together, here toned with sherry and bitters.
History: Adapted from a recipe in W. J. Tarling's 1937 Café Royal Cocktail Book which is credits E. Angerosa with this cocktail's creation.
Nutrition: One serving of Banana Bliss contains 128 calories
